name: Team 19 - Hat Curling Versus
description:
Hat Curling Versus is a local multiplayer game, based on a Nintendo DS format and controls. As a member of an Inuit Tribe, you are trying to prove that you are able to lead your tribe by winning a curling tournament. Your goal will be to score the highest number of points by throwing your spiritial hat on an ice course, and aiming for the center of the target ! But there will be many obstacles to remove and dodge by cleaning the road and using your hat spiritual powers. Each player has 7 turns to try to score as much points as possible : - The player have to first launch their hats using the stylus  - They then have to keep scratching the screen in order to prevent snow and obstacles from slowing down the hat. - Upon meeting certain obstacles, the player will have to make their hats jump in order to prevent them from being stopped by the obstacles. - You score points when your hat touches and stays on the cercle until the end of the game. 

To play the game you can either use a stylus or touch controls : Use your stylus to scratch the snow off your hat and stop it from slowing down : To jump double tap on the screen :

         

 GD : Samuel MARRACHE - Amir ALOTOUNOU - ANNA QUEMAR GP : Téo SAUTEREAU - Antoine JEANSELME - Paul LEDUC GA : Matthieu CADET - Ivan BON Prod : Antoine Boulay
